body.name: McKesson Foamy Shaving Cream, Shave Cream for Men and Women, Lavender Scent, 11 oz, 12 Count
features: Shaving cream is formulated for gentle, soft shaving
Rich, foamy lather helps condition and soften hair, and leaves the skin feeling fresh and clean
Lavender-scented shave foam helps avoid after shave irritation
Shaving cream is suitable for both men and women, providing a close and comfortable shave
Foaming shaving cream is great for everyday bathroom use, as it comes in an 11 oz aerosol can

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #113,991 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #196 in Men's Shaving Creams

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Foam Shaving Cream Make shaving an enjoyable experience using McKesson Foam Shaving Cream. Its unique formula is gentle on the skin and reduces irritation by the blade. The cream lubricates the skin and hair to help make shaving easier and contains hydrating components that moisturize the skin to avoid dryness. The rich formula forms a foam lather that softens hair to reduce the chance of ingrown hairs while helping the razor blade glide smoothly across the skin. The shaving cream leaves skin smelling fresh with a light lavender scent. It comes in an aerosol can for quick and convenient dispensing. The foamy shaving cream for men and women is available in two can sizes: 11 ounces and 1.5 ounces. At a Glance: Gentle formula minimizes the chance of irritation and helps the blade glide smoothlyCream lathers richly to soften hairFeatures a lavender scent that is suitable for men and womenAerosol can is convenient and easy to use

Scented Foam Shaving Cream Lubricates Skin McKesson foam shaving cream lathers richly to help soften and condition hair, reducing the chance of ingrown hairs. It lubricates skin so that shaving blades glide easily across skin for simple shaving. The cream contains hydrating components that moisturize the skin to avoid dryness. It comes in an easy-to-dispense aerosol can that makes it simple to apply. The convenient cans are compact and lightweight for easy portability. Simplifies Shaving Manufactured in a gentle formula, McKesson foam shaving cream has no hazardous elements. Its thick lather allows for use on sensitive skin areas like the bikini line. The shaving cream contains stearic acid, which softens the skin. It contains emulsifiers and surfactants that neutralize fatty acids' pH and allow water to flow freely. Pleasant Lavender Scent For an enjoyable grooming experience, use McKesson foam shaving cream with a relaxing lavender scent. The light fragrance is non-irritating to people with sensitive noses. Its mild nature allows use by males and females. The shaving cream rinses easily, leaving skin feeling clean and fresh. Its Category 2 OSHA HCS 2012 classification makes it safe on all skin types. Choose between a 1.5- or 11-ounce can to meet your unique requirements.

About McKesson: In Business for Better Health For over 180 years, McKesson has supported providers with the medical supplies they need to care for patients and run a healthy business. McKesson offers more than 300,000 products from leading national brands as well as its own private product label, and a suite of services to help businesses and facilities provide quality care, improve business performance, and manage time and expenses. McKesson improves the business of healthcare to help everyone focus on what matters most: patient health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After my dad died, I got his box of toiletries and this shaving cream was in there. Not wanting anything to go to waste, I tried it. Needless to say, I ordered a case and gave some to each daughter. Such a mild, lavender smell and creaminess that goes a long way. No more store bought shaving cream. This stuff is way cheaper too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It must be great.
reviews.reviewText: My neighbor doesn't use computers, and he got a can of this when in the hospital. He loved it, but couldn't find anything like it. So I found it here, and purchased it for him. He shared a can with his daughter. So I had to purchase him another case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is Lavender Scented, NOT regular McKeeson Cream
reviews.reviewText: McKeeson regular shave cream is the best hypoallergenic product…unfortunately, this was lavender scented, which is irritating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my husband and he likes the feel on his face and the shave he gets. He has shared several of the canisters with friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Works well, feels good. Shared with other family members. Will order more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t include ingredient list on listing and when I received it I can see it contains SLS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great product, so sick of shave gels that don't even foam up this is nice thick with decent scent. Also if you can't tell difference between ordering 1 vs a 12 pack try harder, I promise you can do it, it clearly has two different options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'll never have to buy shaving cream again.
reviews.reviewText: A smaller packaging would have been nice.Got all 12 of them, and took one out.I think this is the best shaving cream I've ever used, aside from the gel creams.It's good and thick, and smells good. And it cost less per can than other "premium" save creams, and as good or better.
